mapper.select: SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id

SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id WHERE trip.from_station = #{fromStation}

SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id WHERE trip.to_station = #{toStation}

SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id LEFT JOIN trip_date ON trip_date.id_trip = ticket.id_trip LEFT JOIN trip_schedule ON trip_schedule.id_trip = ticket.id_trip WHERE trip_date.`date` IS NOT NULL AND trip_date.`date` >= DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR trip_schedule.from_date IS NOT NULL AND trip_schedule.from_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id LEFT JOIN trip_date ON trip_date.id_trip = ticket.id_trip LEFT JOIN trip_schedule ON trip_schedule.id_trip = ticket.id_trip WHERE trip_date.`date` IS NOT NULL AND trip_date.`date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR trip_schedule.to_date IS NOT NULL AND trip_schedule.to_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ticket.id as id_ticket_order, ticket.id_trip as id_order, ticket.`date` as date_order, trip.bus_name as bus_name_order, trip.from_station as from_station_order, trip.to_station as to_station_order, trip.`start` as start_order, trip.duration as duration_order, trip.price as price_order, passenger.id as passenger_id, passenger.firstname as passenger_firstname, passenger.lastname as passenger_lastname, passenger.passport as passenger_passport FROM ticket JOIN trip on ticket.id_trip = trip.id JOIN passenger on passenger.id_ticket = ticket.id WHERE trip.bus_name = #{busName}
